verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I do believe, I now believe newline That Jesus died for me;

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Father, I stretch my hands to Thee; newline No other help I know. newline If Thou withdraw thyself from me, newline Ah, whither shall I go?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What did Thine only Son endure newline Before I drew my breath! newline What pain, what labor, newline To secure my soul from endless death!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Author of faith, to Thee I lift newline My weary, longing eyes. newline Oh, let me now receive that gift; newline My soul, without it, dies.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Surely Thou canst not let me die; newline Oh, speak, and I shall live. newline And here I will unwearied lie newline Till Thou Thy Spirit give.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: How would my fainting soul rejoice newline Could I but see Thy face! newline now let me hear Thy quick'ning voice, newline And taste Thy pard'ning grace.
